@sarah_edo @IanColdwater @momscanco I’m the opposite. I like to appear casual and relaxed, so I wear a t-shirt. But I want to feel dialled in and professional, so from the waist down I’m in a freshly pressed tuxedo and some inhumanly uncomfortable dress shoes.
